about_the_game:
Escape the towering prison by mastering your grappling hook! Navigate through vertically moving cubes, avoid deadly spinning turbines, and manage your stamina to reach new heights in this thrilling climb. Die, repeat, learn, and conquer your way to freedom.

Swing and Navigate

Utilize your grappling hook to attach to flying cubes, allowing you to swing through the tower. Master the art of momentum and precision to make your way up, overcoming various obstacles in your path.

Avoid Hazards

Be vigilant of the spinning turbines scattered throughout the tower. One wrong move and you'll find yourself starting from the bottom again. Timing and agility are key to dodging these deadly obstacles.

Manage Stamina

Your grappling hook can only hold onto cubes for a limited time. Keep an eye on your stamina and strategize your moves accordingly. Letting go and recharging your stamina is essential to maintaining your upward momentum.

Reach New Heights

Each successful grapple brings you closer to the top. Overcome increasingly challenging sections of the tower and push your skills to the limit. The higher you climb, the closer you get to your ultimate goal: freedom.



Dive into an exhilarating experience where every swing, every dodge, and every decision matters. Challenge yourself to reach new heights, learn from your failures, and ultimately escape the towering prison.

name: No One's Escaped

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti or AMD R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only runs on 64 bit systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only runs on 64 bit systems
